comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Their father: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constantine_I_of_Greece Their mother: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophia_of_Prussia Constantine and Sophia had six children: George (1890-1947): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_II_of_Greece Alexander (1893-1920): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_of_Greece Helen (1896-1982): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_of_Greece_and_Denmark Paul (1901-1964): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_of_Greece Irene (1904-1974): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Irene,_Duchess_of_Aosta Katherine (1913-2007): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Katherine_of_Greece_and_De... Suspect this is a photo taken before Katherine's birth; if it was taken in 1905 Irene would be the baby in the photo; that would make the oldest son 14, the other boys 12 and 4, and Helen would be 9--those ages all look about right for this group.
